trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the <see cref="P:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed" /> event in the host, and reports error information.
trans-unit.target: 실행 중인 워크플로 인스턴스를 종료하고, 호스트에서 <see cref="P:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed" /> 이벤트를 발생시키고, 오류 정보를 보고합니다.

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로가 종료된 후에는 다시 시작할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow" /> class.
Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 종료를 초래한 예외를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.

If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> 및 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>을 모두 설정하면 지정한 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>을 사용하여 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>이 전달되고 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>이 예외의 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 속성으로 설정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: 둘 다 설정하지 않으면 기본 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>이 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스 종료 이유가 포함된 문자열 입력 인수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.

If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> 및 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>을 모두 설정하면 지정한 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>을 사용하여 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>이 전달되고 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>이 예외의 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 속성으로 설정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
trans-unit.target: 둘 다 설정하지 않으면 기본 <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>이 만들어집니다.
